EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Partner Promotion Notification -{!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Partner Promotion Notification {!Contact.Name}
{!Account.Name}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I am happy to inform you that you have successfully met all the requirements for inclusion in the Elite Tier of SunPower's Dealer Program! This now places you in a very exclusive category within the SunPower Network of Dealers.
Congratulations!!!
I want to personally thank you for all of your hard work, dedication, and commitment. Your new status is effective immediately, meaning you can now begin promoting your company as a SunPower Elite Dealer.
Next Steps:
You are now eligible to earn all Elite Tier bonuses on your net purchases occurring after March 31, 2017.
A bonus $1,500 will be added to your Dealer Program Fund to help you use in ordering an Elite welcome kit and to hold a promotional event. This will be credited to your DP Fund within 7 business days.
You will receive access to the Elite Marketing Resource Center Material within 72 hours of this notice.
Remember that in order to maintain your Elite Tier status, you must continue meeting all relevant requirements and qualifying bonuses within the program, as outlined in the Dealer Agreement.
Congratulations on becoming one of the most successful dealers of the planet's most powerful solar panels. We're excited to welcome you to our exclusive Elite Tier and hope that you continue helping us set new standards in excellence.
Happy selling!
{!Account.RSM__c}
Sales Manager
